# Example

You can test this library on both RT-Thread and PC since I'm using POSIX C.

## 1. Test on RTT

```
msh > elapack_linsolve
[elapack] New thread linsolve

A =

3.000000000000000000 4.000000000000000000 1.000000000000000000
6.000000000000000000 10.000000000000000000 2.000000000000000000
5.000000000000000000 3.000000000000000000 2.000000000000000000

B =

4.000000000000000000 3.000000000000000000 22.000000000000000000 5.000000000000000000
5.000000000000000000 3.000000000000000000 2.000000000000000000 5.000000000000000000
3.000000000000000000 4.000000000000000000 5.000000000000000000 3.000000000000000000

X =

12.499999999999995000 9.499999999999994700 143.999999999999910000 19.499999999999989000
-1.500000000000000000 -1.500000000000000000 -21.000000000000000000 -2.500000000000000000
-27.499999999999982000 -19.499999999999986000 -325.999999999999770000 -43.499999999999972000

[elapack] Total speed was 720.000000 ms
```

## 2. Test on PC

```
$ scons
$ ./pc_linsolve

A =

3.000000000000000000 4.000000000000000000 1.000000000000000000 
6.000000000000000000 10.000000000000000000 2.000000000000000000
5.000000000000000000 3.000000000000000000 2.000000000000000000

B =

4.000000000000000000 3.000000000000000000 22.000000000000000000 5.000000000000000000
5.000000000000000000 3.000000000000000000 2.000000000000000000 5.000000000000000000
3.000000000000000000 4.000000000000000000 5.000000000000000000 3.000000000000000000

X =

12.499999999999994671 9.499999999999994671 143.999999999999914735 19.499999999999989342
-1.500000000000000000 -1.500000000000000000 -21.000000000000000000 -2.500000000000000000
-27.499999999999982236 -19.499999999999985789 -325.999999999999772626 -43.499999999999971578

Total speed was 1.384000 ms
```
